testcase.system-out: * url securityUrl ......................................................... passed * def resultContract = callonce read('../../claroApp/user/contractlist.feature@list') . passed * def decodejwt = ......................................................... passed * def responseApi = ....................................................... passed * headers { contract-number: '#(resultContract.contractnumber)', operator-code: '#(resultContract.operatorcode)', partner-account: '#(partneraccount)', user-info: '#(resultContract.userinfo)', x-application-key: '#(xappkey)' } . passed Given path 'generate-token-by-userinfo/sms' ............................... passed And request {} ............................................................ passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseApi ......................................... passed And def wcp = response.token .............................................. passed And match contractnumber == decodejwt(wcp)[0] ............................. passed And match operatorcode == decodejwt(wcp)[1] ............................... passed And match partneraccount == decodejwt(wcp)[2] ............................. passed
